languages.text: На поверхности планеты замер грандиозный корабль поколений класса "Иерихон", перевозящий пилигримов для заселения новых планет. Это — переоборудованное судно-фабрика прометия, способное перевезти десятки тысяч колонистов к их новому дому. Судя по целостности корпуса, посадка прошла штатно. "Странник в пустоши" значится в реестре кораблей, принадлежащих культу святого Друза. Описание, модель и сигнатура вокс-передатчика совпадают с заявленными в реестре.

Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho-class ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Wasteland Wayfarer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox-transmitter signature match the register record.
languages.original_text: На поверхности планеты замер грандиозный корабль поколений класса "Иерихон", перевозящий пилигримов для заселения новых планет. Это — переоборудованное судно-фабрика прометия, способное перевезти десятки тысяч колонистов к их новому дому. Судя по целостности корпуса, посадка прошла штатно. "Странник в пустоши" значится в реестре кораблей, принадлежащих культу святого Друза. Описание, модель и сигнатура вокс-передатчика совпадают с заявленными в реестре.

traits.locale_text: Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho class generation ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Void Wanderer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox transmitter signature match the register record.

Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho-class ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Wasteland Wayfarer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox-transmitter signature match the register record.

languages.text: Una majestuosa nave de clase Jericho, de las que se usan para trasladar peregrinos a nuevos planetas, se yergue inmóvil sobre la superficie del planeta. Esta nave refinería de prometio convertida puede transportar a decenas de miles de colonos a su nuevo mundo hogar. A juzgar por la integridad del casco, el aterrizaje fue fluido. El Caminante de los Páramos está inscrito en el registro de naves pertenecientes al Culto de San Drusus. Su descripción, modelo y señal de voco transmisor coinciden con el registro.
languages.original_text: Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho-class ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Wasteland Wayfarer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox-transmitter signature match the register record.

traits.locale_text: Una majestuosa nave de clase Jericho, de las que se usan para trasladar peregrinos a nuevos planetas, se yergue inmóvil sobre la superficie del planeta. Esta nave refinería de prometio convertida puede transportar a decenas de miles de colonos a su nuevo mundo hogar. A juzgar por la integridad del casco, el aterrizaje fue fluido. El Vagabundo del Vacío está inscrito en el registro de naves pertenecientes al Culto de San Drusus. Su descripción, modelo y señal de voco transmisor coinciden con el registro.

languages.text: 一艘雄伟的“耶利哥”级飞船一动不动地耸立在行星表面。这种舰船专门用来运送朝圣者前往他们的新家园。舰船系统经过钷素强化改装，可以将数以万计的殖民者送往目的地。从舰体的完整性来判断，当时的着陆过程很顺利。“荒野旅人号”被列入了圣德鲁苏斯教派舰船的登记册中，而眼前这艘舰船的外观、工艺与音阵签名均与登记册上的内容相符。
languages.original_text: Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho-class ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Wasteland Wayfarer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox-transmitter signature match the register record.

traits.locale_text: 一艘雄伟的“耶利哥”级飞船一动不动地耸立在行星表面。这种舰船专门用来运送朝圣者前往他们的新家园。舰船系统经过钷素强化改装，可以将数以万计的殖民者送往目的地。从舰体的完整性来判断，当时的着陆过程很顺利。“虚空行者”号被列入了圣德鲁苏斯教派舰船的登记册中，而眼前这艘舰船的外观、工艺与音阵签名均与登记册上的内容相符。

languages.text: 惑星の表面にじっとそびえ立つのは、巡礼者が別の惑星へ移住するときに使う荘厳なジェリコ級の宇宙船だ。この改良されたプロメチウム製のよくできた宇宙船は、新しい故郷を求める何万人もの移住者を運ぶことができる。船体に目立った損傷はない、着陸に問題はなかったのだろう。ウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号は、聖ドルスス教団が所有すると船の登録簿に書いてあった。船の描写、製造、音声送信機のサインがどれも登録記録と一致する。
languages.original_text: Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho-class ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Wasteland Wayfarer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox-transmitter signature match the register record.

traits.locale_text: 惑星の表面にじっとそびえ立つのは、巡礼者が別の惑星へ移住するときに使う荘厳なジェリコ級の宇宙船だ。この改良されたプロメチウム製のよくできた宇宙船は、新しい故郷を求める何万人もの移住者を運ぶことができる。船体に目立った損傷はない、着陸に問題はなかったのだろう。ウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号は、聖ドルスス教団が所有すると船の登録簿に書いてあった。船の描写、製造、音声送信機のサインがどれも登録記録と一致する。

languages.text: Auf der Planetenoberfläche ragt majestätisch und bewegungslos ein Schiff empor – Jericho-Klasse, zum Transport von Pilger-Siedlern auf neue Planeten. Diese umgebaute Promethium-Raffinerieschiff kann Zehntausende Kolonisten auf ihre neue Heimatwelt bringen. Da der Rumpf unversehrt ist, verlief die Landung wohl reibungslos. Die Wasteland Wayfarer steht im Register der Schiffe, die dem Kult des Heiligen Drusus gehören. Beschreibung, Ausstattung und Vox-Übertragungssignatur entsprechen dem Registereintrag.
languages.original_text: Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho-class ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Wasteland Wayfarer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox-transmitter signature match the register record.

traits.locale_text: Auf der Planetenoberfläche ragt majestätisch und bewegungslos ein Schiff empor – Jericho-Klasse, zum Transport von Pilger-Siedlern auf neue Planeten. Diese umgebaute Promethium-Raffinerieschiff kann Zehntausende Kolonisten auf ihre neue Heimatwelt bringen. Da der Rumpf unversehrt ist, verlief die Landung wohl reibungslos. Die Void Wanderer steht im Register der Schiffe, die dem Kult des Hl. Drusus gehören. Beschreibung, Ausstattung und Vox-Übertragungssignatur entsprechen dem Registereintrag.

languages.text: Aussi imposant que majestueux, le géant immobile est un appareil de classe Jericho, un ancien vaisseau-raffinerie de prométhium, qui a été converti en transport capable de conduire des dizaines de milliers de pèlerins sur les planètes qu'ils doivent coloniser. Sa coque intacte semble indiquer que l'atterrissage s'est déroulé sans encombre. Son apparence et la signature de son émetteur-vox correspondent aux informations listées dans le registre de la flotte du Culte de Saint Drusus, à laquelle le Défricheur appartient.
languages.original_text: Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho-class ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Wasteland Wayfarer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox-transmitter signature match the register record.

traits.locale_text: Aussi imposant que majestueux, le géant immobile est un appareil de classe Jericho, un ancien vaisseau-raffinerie de prométhium, qui a été converti en transport capable de conduire des dizaines de milliers de pèlerins sur les planètes qu'ils doivent coloniser. Sa coque intacte semble indiquer que l'atterrissage s'est déroulé sans encombre. Son apparence et la signature de son émetteur-vox correspondent aux informations listées dans le registre de la flotte du Culte de Saint Drusus, à laquelle le Voyageur du Néant appartient.

languages.text: Seyyah yerleşimcileri yeni gezegenlere nakletmekte kullanılan, görkemli bir Jeriko sınıfı gemi, gezegenin yüzeyinde hareketsiz duruyor. Bu dönüştürülmüş prometyum rafineri gemisi, on binlerce koloniciyi yeni evlerine taşıyabilme kapasitesine sahip. Gövdenin hasar almamış olmasına bakılırsa sorunsuz bir şekilde iniş yapmış. Çorak Diyar Yolcusu, kayıtlarda Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'na ait olarak görünüyor. Tanımı, tasarımı ve voks vericisinin kodları, kayıtlardakiyle eşleşiyor.
languages.original_text: Towering motionless on the planet's surface is a majestic Jericho-class ship, the type that transports pilgrim settlers to new planets. This converted promethium refinery vessel can transport tens of thousands of colonists to their new homeworld. The landing was smooth, judging by the hull integrity. The Wasteland Wayfarer is listed on the register of ships belonging to the Cult of Saint Drusus. Its description, make, and vox-transmitter signature match the register record.

traits.locale_text: Seyyah yerleşimcileri yeni gezegenlere nakletmekte kullanılan, görkemli bir Jeriko sınıfı gemi, gezegenin yüzeyinde hareketsiz duruyor. Bu dönüştürülmüş prometyum rafineri gemisi, on binlerce kolonisti yeni evlerine taşıyabilme kapasitesine sahip. Gövdenin hasar almamış olmasına bakılırsa sorunsuz bir şekilde iniş yapmış. Çorak Diyar Yolcusu, kayıtlarda Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'na ait olarak görünüyor. Tanımı, tasarımı ve voks vericisinin kodları, kayıtlardakiyle eşleşiyor.
